metadata.title: CVE-2020-28491 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: This affects the package com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-cbor from 0 and before 2.11.4, from 2.12.0-rc1 and before 2.12.1. Unchecked allocation of byte buffer can cause a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError exception.

criterions.comment: jackson-dataformat-cbor package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
